mapper.sql: a.t_Profile_ID, a.t_Profile_CertificationCode, a.t_Profile_OrgName, a.t_Profile_Qualification, a.t_Profile_QualificationStatus, a.t_Profile_Mobile, a.t_Profile_Contact, a.t_Profile_Email, a.t_Profile_Address, a.t_Profile_PostRet, a.t_Profile_IPaddress, a.t_Profile_StatusRptRetAddress, a.t_Profile_CurrentAddress, a.t_Profile_text1, a.t_Profile_text2, a.t_Profile_text3, a.t_Profile_text4, a.platform, a.remark, a.creator, a.create_time, a.modifier, a.modify_time
mapper.select:
select
from t_organization_profile a where a.t_Profile_ID = #{t_Profile_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.create_time

select
from t_organization_profile a where a.t_Profile_OrgName = #{t_Profile_OrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.create_time

select
from t_organization_profile a where
a.t_Profile_OrgName like CONCAT('%',#{t_Profile_OrgName},'%')
and a.t_Profile_Qualification like CONCAT('%',#{t_Profile_Qualification},'%')
and a.t_Profile_QualificationStatus like CONCAT('%',#{t_Profile_QualificationStatus},'%')
and a.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
and a.t_Profile_IPaddress like CONCAT('%',DATE(#{t_Profile_IPaddress}),'%')
order by create_time

mapper.select:
select
from t_organization_profile a where 1=1
and type <= #{typeEnd}
order by a.create_time

select
from t_organization_profile a where t_Profile_QualificationStatus = "on" order by a.create_time

t_Profile_ID = #{t_Profile_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
